meanings.definition: Make known (information that was previously kept secret)
meanings.sent1: She divulged the surprise party plan to her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The detective finally divulged the identity of the culprit.
meanings.sent3: The magician accidentally divulged his trick to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun slowly divulged its vibrant colors to the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map divulged the location of the hidden chest.

meanings.sent1: He reluctantly divulged his embarrassing childhood nickname.
meanings.sent2: The diary entry divulged her deepest thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent3: The gossip columnist loves to divulge juicy celebrity secrets.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph divulged a long-forgotten memory.
meanings.sent5: The locked box finally divulged its mysterious contents.
